html:
Soâ€¦what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isnâ€™t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. Itâ€™s just a list of more or less random questions Iâ€™ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. Which would you rather collect: vintage clothes or vintage furniture?

I could do both, but if I could only pick one, Iâ€™d have to go with vintage clothes, mostly because I donâ€™t have a big enough house to collect furniture pieces. Sigh! Oh, and also, I donâ€™t want to worry about my furniture being beat up by the pets and the kids playing in my house, you know?

2. How good are you with keeping secrets?

If you tell me something in confidence, itâ€™s going to the grave with me, babe; however, I do have an exception policy. If I believe someoneâ€™s in danger, then Iâ€™m gonna say something.

3. Whoâ€™s the coolest Jennifer: Jennifer Hudson, Jennifer Lopez, Jennifer Garner or Jennifer Coolidge?

Jennifer Coolidge, all the way.

4. Whatâ€™s the nicest thing youâ€™ve done for yourself lately?

For the last month, Iâ€™ve made it a priority to work out. Itâ€™s made such a difference in my sleep, mood and overall energy.

5. Pick one: spaghetti or lasagna?

If someone else makes it for me, then lasagna. I enjoy leftover lasagna much more than spaghetti. ðŸ™‚

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
